meanings.definition: People who attend a show or performance.
meanings.sent1: The showgoers clapped loudly at the end of the play.
meanings.sent2: The showgoers eagerly awaited the start of the concert.
meanings.sent3: The showgoers were so engrossed in the performance, they almost forgot to leave.
meanings.sent4: The showgoers were like bees buzzing around a hive, excitedly moving from one exhibit to the next.
meanings.sent5: The showgoers' faces lit up with joy as the magician performed his tricks.

meanings.definition: Those who go to see a show or event.
meanings.sent1: The showgoers purchased tickets in advance to secure their seats.
meanings.sent2: The showgoers formed a long line outside the theater.
meanings.sent3: The showgoers chatted excitedly about the upcoming show while waiting in line.
meanings.sent4: The showgoers flooded into the stadium like a river rushing downstream.
meanings.sent5: The showgoers' laughter filled the room during the comedy show.
